title: Ashes
text:
She walks on the cool grass
to the blue lake,
she dips her toe in
once, the again over and over
repetitively, like her days,
til her body is filled with cold
and her toe is numb.
She does the same
until her whole body is in
the water is cold, harsh, ice
the water is reality
cold, harsh reality
after a while her body is succumbed in numbness
Soon a small trickle so hot,
the water runs over her face
her tears of fire
more and more until the water is boiling
boiling water burning her body
this water is nothing but words
harsh, hot, burning words
escaping their lips
again and again,
repetitively,
until her body is nothing but ashes..
